acomplishments.description: Company creator Innovation Crazy Dave Solutions. we search give a unique experience to ours clients with quality software.
We have carried out different projects such as 'MediCan'. Specialized software for veterinarians.
Design actualization of Tesla Motors User Interface.
I was leading a group of 5 developers.
Leader of a project to automate and increase work activities through artificial intelligence so that people can get the most out of their business impact.
With the support of team collaborators, we managed to finish 2 different projects on time and in the right way.
